title: GE GCST16S1WTS Microwave Oven, 1,150-watt 8 Auto Cooking Settings, Kitchen Essentials for The Countertop, Dorm Room or Apartment, Child-Lock Technology 1.6 Cu. Ft, Black Stainless
description: Heat leftovers and speed up cooking in your kitchen with this GE countertop microwave. Instant-on settings let you cook popcorn, vegetables and other foods with the touch of a single button, while weight and time defrost options make it easy to prepare meats for cooking. Featuring a large turntable, this GE countertop microwave delivers even, reliable heating for your dining and snacking needs.
